snippet: Data and arithmetic make clear that the Affordable Care Act could have negative effects on employment, despite the optimism of the law’s supporters, an economist writes.
abstract: Data and arithmetic make clear that the Affordable Care Act could have negative effects on employment, despite the optimism of the law’s supporters, an economist writes.

headline.main: Health Care Inflation and the Arithmetic of Labor Taxes

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
